4.5.8 Diagnostic evaluation of nerves: Multiple sensory and functional disorders within the region of the pelvis/urogenital system may occur   as a result of injury to one or more of many nerves. The anatomy is complex.
There is no single aetiology for the nerve damage and the symptoms and signs may be few or multiple.
The peripheral nerve pain syndromes are frequently associated with negative cognitive, behavioural,   sexual, or emotional consequences.
